name: Oi, Innkeep! - Chronicles!
description:
Oi, Innkeep! Chronicles Step into a world of food and magic! Throw vampire parties, commit insurance fraud, meet talking mops, save magic mirrors, snort Fairy Dust and more in this narrative-driven, adventure prequel series to Oi, Innkeep!Series FormatOi, Innkeep! Chronicles is a series of short, story-driven, episodic games that serve as a prequel to Oi, Innkeep! We plan to release as many of these fun, bite-sized experiences as we can before Oi, Innkeep!'s upcoming release.

To check out Oi, Innkeep! which Chronicles! leads to, please go here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/824840/Oi_Innkeep/
